column3: na Israel mboanofo no nyinara baa Sin sar a ɔda Elim nye Sinai ntamu no do
column4: nna wofii Egypt asaase do no
column5: no bosoom a otsia ebien no mu da a otsia duenum nye no."

column2: "Na Israelmba mboanofo man mu nyinara hwinhwiin Moses nye Aaron ho wɔ sar no do:"

column3: Mbom nkyɛ EWURADZE mma yenwuwu ne nsaano wɔ Egypt asaase do
column4: aber a yɛtsetse nam nkutu ho no
column5: aber a yedzi edziban mee no; osiandɛ hom dze hɛn efir edzi aba sar yi do
column6: dɛ hom dze akɔmfun rubokuku mboanofo man mu yi nyinara."

column3: Hwɛ
column4: mebɛma edziban efi sor atɔ ama hom; na ɔman no befir edzi akɛtase dza ɔbɔso hɔn ano da kor wɔ ne da mu
column5: ma maasɔ hɔn mahwɛ kyerɛ dɛ wobedzi me mbra do anaa wonnkedzi do."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ da a otsia esia no
column3: wobesiesie dza wɔdze ba no
column4: na ɔbɛyɛ dza wɔtase no daa no no mbɔho ebien."

column2: "Na Moses nye Aaron see Israelmba no nyinara dɛ
column3: Ewimbir nna hom bohu dɛ EWURADZE eyi hom efi Egypt asaase do:"

column2: "na anapa nna hom bohu EWURADZE n’enyimnyam; osiandɛ ɔtse hom ehwinhwin a hom hwinhwin EWURADZE ho no: na hɛn dze
column3: ebɛnadze nye hɛn
column4: na hom hwinhwin hɛn ho?"

column3: Iyi bɛba
column4: EWURADZE bɛma hom nam ewimbir ma woeedzi
column6: osiandɛ EWURADZE tse hom ehwinhwin a hom dze hwinhwin no ho: na ebɛnadze nye hɛn? Nnyɛ hɛn ho na hom hwinhwin

column3: Se Israelmba mboanofo no nyinara dɛ
column4: Hom ntwe mpin EWURADZE enyim: na ɔatse hom ehwinhwin no."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ Aaron rekasa kyerɛ Israelmba mboanofo nyinara no
column3: wɔdandaan hɔn enyi kɔr sar no do
column4: na hwɛ
column5: EWURADZE enyimnyam puei wɔ mununkum no mu."

column4: "Matse Israelmba ehwinhwin no: ka kyerɛ hɔn dɛ
column6: na anapa hom edzi edziban amee; na hom ehu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ ewimbir no Nkokɔhwerɛw bae
column3: na wɔbɛkataa nseraban no do: na anapa no ɔbɔw tɔr nseraban no ho hyiae."

column2: "Na ɔbɔw a ɔtɔree no kɔr sor no
column3: hwɛ
column4: adze bi nkorkorba nketsenketse deda sar no enyi

column3: wɔsesee hɔnho nkorkor dɛ
column4: Ebɛnadze nye yi?  Osiandɛ wonnyim adze kor no. Na Moses see hɔn dɛ
column5: Iyi nye edziban a EWURADZE dze ama hom dɛ hom ndzi."
column6: "#1 Kor 10.3 #16.15 EBƐNADZE NYE YI: Hibriw no ka dɛ: Man hu."

column3: Hom ntase bi dɛ mbrɛ nyimpa biara n’edzidzi tse; olonka nkorkor
column4: dɛ mbrɛ hom nyimpa dodow tse
column6: nyimpa biara mfa mma hɔn a wɔwɔ n’asesee mu no."

column3: na wɔtasee
column4: binom dze so

column3: nyia ɔtasee pii no oennya bi ammbor do
column4: na nyia ɔtasee kumaabi no annka no bi: wɔtasee dɛ mbrɛ nyimpa biara n’edzidzi tse."

column3: Mma obi nngya bi ma adze nnkye do."

column2: "Naaso woenntsie Moses; mbom hɔn mu binom gyaa bi ma adze kyee do
column3: na ɔdɔɔ mbowaba
column4: na ɔbɔnee; na Moses no bo fuuw hɔn."

column3: nyimpa biara dɛ mbrɛ n’edzidzi tse: na ewia ano yɛɛ dzen no
column4: ɔnanee."

column3: da a otsia esia no wɔtasee edziban no mbɔho
column4: ɔbaako dze yɛ olonka ebien: na mboanofo no mu mpanyimfo nyinara baa bɛkaa kyerɛɛ Moses."

column3: Iyi nye dza EWURADZE aka no
column4: Ɔkyena yɛ awɔse ahomgye
column5: ahomgyeda krɔnkrɔn ma EWURADZE: hom nto dza hom bɔto
column6: na hom nnoa dza hom bɔnoa; na dza ɔka no nyinara hom mfa nsie ma adze nkye do."

column3: dɛ mbrɛ Moses hyɛe no: na ɔammbɔn
column4: nkyii so abowaba bi nnyi mu."

column3: Hom ndzi ɔno ndɛ; na ndɛ ɔyɛ ahomgyeda ma EWURADZE: ndɛ hom nnkohu bi wɔ haban mu."

column2: "Nda esia na hom ntase; na da a otsia esuon no dze ɔyɛ ahomgyeda
column3: ɔno mu bi nnkɛba hɔ."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ da a otsia esuon no
column3: ɔman no mu bi fiir edzi dɛ wɔrekɛtase
column4: na woennhu bi."

column3: Hom ropow dɛ wodzi me mbransɛm nye me mbra do ma ekodu dabɛn?"
osiandɛ EWURADZE ama hom ahomgyeda ntsi
column4: na da a otsia esia no ɔma hom nda ebien edziban: hom mu nyimpa biara ntsena ne tsenabew
column5: mma obiara mmfir edzi mmfi ne tsenabew wɔ da a otsia esuon no mu."

column2: "Nna ɔman no hoom da a otsia esuon no."
"Na Israel fi frɛɛ ne dzin Manna: nna ɔtse dɛ wusa aba
column3: fitaa
column4: na ne dɛw tse dɛ tatar ntrɛtraba a wɔdze ewo ayɛ."

column3: Iyi nye adze a EWURADZE ahyɛ
column4: Wɔmfa bi nhyɛ esusudze olonka ma mfa nsie hom ebusuasantsen; ama woeehu edziban a medze menyɛɛn hom wɔ sar no do
column5: aber a miyii hom fii Egypt asaase do no."

column3: Fa kutu bi
column4: na fa manna esusudze olonka kor gu mu

column3: dɛmara so na Aaron dze sii Adasehyɛdze no enyim
column4: ma wɔdze eesie."

column2: "Na Israelmba dzii manna no mfe eduanan
column3: dze kodur dɛ wɔbaa asaase a nyimpa tse do do; wodzii manna no
column4: dze kodur dɛ wɔbaa Keenan asaase no ntoaado."

column2: "Afei esusudze olonka yɛ efa mu ebupɛn du mu kor."
